title: Merge pull request #49 from chendrak/patch-1
message:
Merge pull request #49 from chendrak/patch-1

Use getMeasuredWidth() and -Height() for measuring header

title: Use getMeasuredWidth() and -Height() for measuring header
message:
Use getMeasuredWidth() and -Height() for measuring header

The RecyclerView itself is sometimes not laid out properly, so getWidth() will return 0. Using getMeasuredWidth instead will return the proper size, so the headers will be laid out properly and show up. Fixes https://github.com/edubarr/header-decor/issues/45

title: Port fixes related to item animation from StickyHeaderDecoration to DoubleHeaderDecoration:
message:
Port fixes related to item animation from StickyHeaderDecoration to DoubleHeaderDecoration:
- Checking adapter position instead of just layout position
- Considering getTranslationY when calling getTop on child views

Additional fixes to DoubleHeaderDecoration re: smooth scrolling
- Ignore extra child views invisible (off the top of the RecyclerView)
